file_content.text: Koth? Is that... blaster fire?
Almost there! Three more minutes!
Koth, we don't have three more minutes!
Two and a half!
Outlander! You are guilty of assassinating the Immortal Emperor, and of evading imprisonment!
We demand your immediate surrender!
Knights of Zakuul. A policing body under Vaylin's charge. Force sensitives.
Your Emperor killed millions. He got what he deserved.
Valkorion had to be stopped.
Valkorion made Zakuul great. Now he's gone because of you! Surrender now!
If you want to arrest the Emperor's killer, go find Arcann.
I'm innocent.
Arcann has mourned his father like none other and you dare question his pain!
Is their philosophy more Jedi or Sith?
What's their doctrine, Lana?
Are they more like us, or more like the Jedi?
What's their doctrine, Lana?
To them, the Force is an instrument to be used in pursuit of justice. Nothing more.
We need to gain the upper hand. They must have some tactical disadvantage.
What's their weakness, Lana?
Not that I've encountered. They're well-trained, extremely competent.
Stop talking, disarm, and surrender at once!
I demand your immediate surrender for dressing like... whatever that getup is.
You Knights look weird.
We are serious! Surrender now!
If he's your Immortal Emperor, then how could I have killed him?
Flawed logic, Knights....
You are a wanted fugitive! Surrender now!
As long as I'm breathing, I'll never give in to you--or to Arcann. Tell him I said so.
I don't surrender.
You can tell Arcann yourself.
You have me mistaken for a Jedi. I do not surrender.
I'm a Sith, not a pushover.
I can't tell you how many times I've been asked to lay down my arms. It's not happening.
I don't surrender.
The thing with carbonite is I really, absolutely hated it the last time, so no.
Back into storage? No thanks.
This time we'll give you to Vaylin. She has other ways of making you pay for your crimes.
Zakuul Knights, Jedi Knights... getting in everyone's business when you need to be getting out of my way.
Same old moral Force users.
I don't answer to demands. Not to yours, nor to anyone else's. Are we clear?
You don't control me.
Then you give us no choice.
This confrontation isn't what you want. You'd rather go home.
[Force persuade] Don't fight.
You are about to make a grave mistake. I suggest you think twice.
Go away. I'm warning you....
It doesn't have to be like this. You can still walk away.
Let's not fight.
She must be joking.
He must be joking.
Take them by force!
Try and make me.
No. [Attack them]
